entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache In ASP.NET WEB API - Error Instantiating #77101
  • Why SemaphoreSlims are not as optimized as Channels? #77098
  • [Mono] Collapse cross compiler legs on official build #77097
    8.0.0
  • Invalid UnixFileMode value when using the TarFile API #77096
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotImplementedException: CORINFO_HELP_GETSYNCFROMCLASSHANDLE #77093
  • Unexpected performance loss when using Vector<T> with different code order #77092
  • [API Proposal]: add internal function `hostfxr_get_active_host_context()` #77091
  • [Mono] System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests source generator tests crash in DeflateInit2_ #77090

Closed

  • Got error when building mono browser os. #77006
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Typo #77104
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold 'static readonly struct' to constants #77102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete unused extension #77088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Add "_generated.*" suffix to some auto-generated files #77083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • NativeAOT: remove some headers that are not needed #77042
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
